data.name: Bexorg, Inc.
data.description:
Bexorg is a privately held techbio company with the first-ever full tech stack platform to support CNS drug discovery and development in the human brain in a way that has not been possible before. 

Our proprietary whole-brain perfusion technology can be used to study brain connectivity, circuit function, and disease processes, with the aim to identify novel targets, biomarkers, and effectiveness of therapeutics for neurological disorders before going into the clinic. Our proprietary BrainEx platform generates high-fidelity human brain molecular datasets that drive our XO Digital application, a machine learning and AI-centered engine for drug discovery and development.

In collaboration with the NIH, Bexorg’s founders have been at the forefront of bioethics in post-mortem human brain scientific research, and we have an independent board comprised of bioethics leaders to ensure our operations maintain the highest standards.

Bexorg is strategically partnering with leading neuroscience companies to integrate its platform into CNS clinical development programs, as well as advancing in-house neurodegeneration assets.
data.enriched_summary: minebright is a team of software engineers and mining professionals that work across industries to grow shareholder value by modernizing their client’s systems and streamlining their business processes. They provide innovative software solutions tailored to the challenges of modern operations.
data.metadata_title: Decode the brain, build the future. | Bexorg
data.metadata_description: We are creating a world without brain disease.

updates.description:
Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s diseases demand human-relevant models. Bexorg’s BrainEx sustains molecularly active whole human brains from patients with neurological diseases, enabling precise target validation, biomarker discovery, and therapeutic evaluation in authentic human disease conditions — before entering the clinic.

Learn more at https://lnkd.in/ez5mp47d.

Today, we announced a multi-program research collaboration with Biohaven to help identify and advance next-generation therapies for CNS indications. As part of the collaboration, Bexorg’s novel whole-brain discovery platform, BrainEx, will be used to generate biomarker and other data to support two preclinical programs at Biohaven, with the goal of informing IND-enabling studies and future clinical trials. 
 
We are thrilled to team up with Biohaven to help advance its programs and potentially unlock a faster, more precise path to new CNS therapies. 
 
Learn more: https://bit.ly/45Oqz3G

We’re honored to be featured in Endpoints News for our work unlocking the complexities of the human brain to accelerate breakthrough therapies for CNS disorders. The story spotlights BrainEx - our proprietary, whole-brain discovery platform and the only technology of its kind capable of identifying, de-risking, and advancing next-generation CNS treatments.

We’re excited to continue pushing the boundaries of neuroscience and reimagining what’s possible for patients. https://lnkd.in/e_vkzqKU

Bexorg will be at #BIO2025 in Boston, June 16-19. Connect with CEO & Co-founder Zvonimir Vrselja and CBO Brian Hotchkiss to learn how our BrainEx platform can derisk CNS pipelines. This first-of-its-kind whole human brain perfusion platform generates comprehensive OMICS data to help evaluate the effectiveness of therapeutics for CNS diseases before going into the clinic.  
 
Schedule a meeting at https://bit.ly/3ZJurPG.
We’re #hiring a new Veterinarian / Surgical Veterinary Technician in New Haven, Connecticut. Apply today or share this post with your network.

updates.reshared_post_description:
Are you (or your friend/colleague) a software engineer passionate about biomedical research? Join us at bexorg.com, where you'll play a vital role in developing cutting-edge software systems. Let's decode the human brain together! 🧠  
https://lnkd.in/dn6VbsMf

updates.description: What if we could reanimate and keep alive human organs outside of the body for days at a time? Learn about a new era of #drugdiscovery with more physiological human disease models, #tissueengineering, and applications for #transplant #medicine in this session at #SynBioBeta2024: https://lnkd.in/gZHsCc2T
We are hiring! Join our team.

What if we could reanimate and keep alive human organs outside of the body for days at a time? Learn about a new era of #drugdiscovery with more physiological human disease models, #tissueengineering, and applications for #transplant #medicine in this session at #SynBioBeta2024: https://lnkd.in/gZHsCc2T

The human brain is home to a staggering 200 billion cells and 600 trillion connections, making it the most elaborate structure we know.

But the question is: "Can we turn brainwaves into bytes?"

No need to worry, because Zvonimir Vrselja  CEO of Bexorg, Inc.  answered that question at this year's The Geek Gathering

Pioneering Bexorg's innovative technology, he introduced a platform capable of revitalizing brain circulation and cellular functions after death, paving the path for groundbreaking explorations of complex brains.

Your story has unquestionably sparked inspiration in many; thank you, Zvonimir! 🙌🏼
We are hiring! Join our team.
